txt.en: Place the cooled weapons in an empty barrel
You should smith some weapons at the forge in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.
Angbor can be found at Aragorn's Pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nYou should talk to Angbor.
The cooling bucket is located next to the forge in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nYou should cool the recently forged weapons.
An empty weapons barrel is located near the forge in Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nYou should place the cooled weapons in a barrel.
The blades are ready for the march east
'I commend you on the quality of these blades. I am sure those who use them in battle will best their foes.'
Angbor has been tasked with arming the men who will march east, and is short of the swords required.
'Our smiths are taking a much-needed rest, but we have not the swords required for all who will march with us.\n\n'You have many skills, [placeholder]. Will you forge some blades for our men?'
